data.comment: The match is underway in San Sebastian.
Throw-in for Huesca in the half of Real Sociedad.
In the minute 1, Ball safe as Real Sociedad is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Huesca in their own half.
In the minute 3, Throw-in Huesca.
Real Sociedad to take a throw-in in Huesca territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 4, Real Sociedad awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Huesca drive upfield and David Ferreiro gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Real Sociedad defender.
Throw-in for Huesca at Reale Arena.
In the minute 6, Huesca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Real Sociedad in the half of Huesca.
Throw-in high up the field for Real Sociedad in San Sebastian.
In the minute 11, Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Huesca in their own half.
Throw-in for Real Sociedad at Reale Arena.
In the minute 14, Can Huesca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Real Sociedad's half?
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a Real Sociedad throw-in in Huesca's half.
Ball safe as Huesca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 16, At Reale Arena, Huesca are penalized for being offside.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a free kick to Real Sociedad.
It's a goal kick for the away team in San Sebastian.
In the minute 19, Free kick for Real Sociedad in their own half.
Real Sociedad awarded a free kick in their own half.
Real Sociedad needs to be cautious. Huesca have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 22, In San Sebastian a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick Huesca.
Aritz Elustondo (Real Sociedad) has received a yellow card from Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos.
In the minute 24, In San Sebastian, Huesca push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Huesca in the half of Real Sociedad.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a free kick to Huesca in their own half.
In the minute 27, Huesca's Rafa Mir has run offside.
Goal kick for Huesca at Reale Arena.
Throw-in Huesca.
In the minute 30, Huesca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Huesca in their own half.
Ball safe as Huesca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 34, An attacking Real Sociedad player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a free kick to Real Sociedad.
Goal! Mikel Oyarzabal gives Real Sociedad the lead from the penalty spot. The score is now 1-0.
In the minute 37, Real Sociedad awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Real Sociedad.
Ball goes out of play for a Huesca goal kick.
In the minute 39, Huesca push upfield but Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos quickly pulls them for offside.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a Real Sociedad throw-in in Huesca's half.
Throw-in for Real Sociedad at Reale Arena.
In the minute 41, In San Sebastian Real Sociedad attack through Mikel Oyarzabal. The finish is off target, however.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos awards Huesca a goal kick.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 42, Free kick for Huesca in their own half.
Throw-in for Huesca in their own half.
In San Sebastian a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 45, Rafa Mir of Huesca smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Can Real Sociedad capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Real Sociedad surge into the attack at Reale Arena but Aritz Elustondoâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 45, Huesca have a goal kick.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos blows to end the first-half.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Goal! Huesca draw level to 1-1 through a Rafa Mir header.
Great play from Javi Galan to set up the goal.
Real Sociedad's David Silva misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 47, Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos awards Huesca a goal kick.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a free kick to Huesca in their own half.
Huesca have been awarded a corner by Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos.
In the minute 50, Corner awarded to Huesca.
Real Sociedad's David Silva gets in a shot on goal at Reale Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 52, Real Sociedad's Mikel Oyarzabal gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in San Sebastian.
Can Huesca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Real Sociedad's half?
In the minute 53, Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a throw-in for Real Sociedad, close to Huesca's area.
Goal! Real Sociedad have taken a 2-1 lead courtesy of a header from Mikel Oyarzabal.
Andoni Gorosabel with an assist there.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Real Sociedad at Reale Arena.
Ball safe as Real Sociedad is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The away team replace David Ferreiro with Dani Escriche.
In the minute 56, Sergio Gomez is replacing Sandro Ramirez for Huesca at Reale Arena.
Huesca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Real Sociedad.
In the minute 57, Throw-in Huesca.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Dani Escriche of Huesca is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 60, Huesca to take a throw-in in Real Sociedad territory.
Free kick for Real Sociedad in their own half.
At Reale Arena, Dani Escriche has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 61, Free kick for Huesca in the half of Real Sociedad.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a free kick to Real Sociedad.
Ball goes out of play for a Huesca goal kick.
In the minute 63, The home team have replaced Willian Jose with Alexander Isak. This is the first substitution made today by Imanol Alguacil.
Mikel Merino is replacing Jon Guridi for the home team.
In the minute 64, Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos awards the away team a throw-in.
In San Sebastian a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Mikel Oyarzabal is booked for the home team.
Huesca awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 66, Throw-in for Real Sociedad at Reale Arena.
Throw-in for Huesca in their own half.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a free kick to Huesca in their own half.
In the minute 67, Huesca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Real Sociedad drives forward and Alexander Isak gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Goal! Real Sociedad extend their lead to 3-1 through Portu.
In the minute 68, David Silva instrumental with a fine assist.
Huesca to take a throw-in in Real Sociedad territory.
Free kick for Huesca in the half of Real Sociedad.
In the minute 71, Huesca make their third substitution with Kelechi Nwakali replacing Jaime Seoane.
Gaston Silva is on a sub for Javi Galan for Huesca.
In the minute 72, Corner awarded to Real Sociedad.
The away team replace Pablo Maffeo with Javier Ontiveros.
Huesca pushes forward through Javier Ontiveros, whose finish on goal is saved.
Alexander Isak for Real Sociedad is whistled offside.
In the minute 74, Real Sociedad have a goal kick.
Alexander Isak puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 4-1.
That's a fine assist from David Silva.
In the minute 76, Imanol Alguacil (Real Sociedad) is making a third substitution, with Modibo Sagnan replacing Portu.
Jon Bautista is on a sub for Mikel Oyarzabal for Real Sociedad.
Real Sociedad make their fifth substitution with Roberto Lopez replacing David Silva.
In the minute 77, Ball safe as Huesca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Real Sociedad have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick Huesca.
In the minute 80, In San Sebastian a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Huesca have been awarded a corner by Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos.
Corner awarded to Huesca.
In the minute 81, Goal kick for Real Sociedad at Reale Arena.
Throw-in Real Sociedad.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 83, In San Sebastian, Alexander Isak (Real Sociedad) misses the target with a header.
Goal kick for Huesca at Reale Arena.
Throw-in Huesca.
In the minute 84, Ball safe as Huesca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Real Sociedad get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Huesca's half?
Real Sociedad have been awarded a corner by Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos.
In the minute 87, Real Sociedad have been awarded a corner by Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos.
Corner awarded to Real Sociedad.
Real Sociedad's Aritz Elustondo breaks free at Reale Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 88, Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos awards Huesca a goal kick.
Throw-in for Real Sociedad in the half of Huesca.
Corner awarded to Huesca.
In the minute 89, Huesca's Borja Garcia is on target but unsuccessful.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Huesca drive forward but Rafa Mir is judged offside.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos blows to end the match. The final score is 4-1.
